Question: Zhejiang Tonoch Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zhejiang Tonoch Electronics Co., Ltd. - CES 2024

- Specializes in PA speakers, consumer speakers, battery speakers, power amplifiers, and mixers
- Offers a wide range of audio products, including portable speakers and waterproof speakers
- Two large factories with over 70,000 square meters of production area and more than 800 employees
- Equipped with SMT, Plug-in Machine, Injection-Molding Machine, and Hardware Workshop for production
- Committed to providing total customer satisfaction through advanced design and high-quality products
- Contact information: No.1111, Jinhai Road, East Cixi Coastal Economic Development District, Ningbo, Zhejiang Province, Tel: +86-574-89201369, Email: serena@tonoch.com
